citations.narrative:
The bunk feeders kept inside the outdoor enclosures of 3 steers, 28 sheep and 14 goats are not maintained in good
repair. The feeders are rusty and broken with jagged edges. The animals can get injured while trying to eat off the
feeder. The food receptacles must be repaired or replaced to ensure the safety of the animals.
To be corrected by August 30th, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The bunk feeders kept inside the outdoor enclosures of 3 steers, 28 sheep and 14 goats are not maintained in good 
repair.  The feeders are rusty and broken with jagged edges.  The animals can get injured while trying to eat off the 
feeder.  The food receptacles must be repaired or replaced to ensure the safety of the animals. 
To be corrected by August 30th, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
